participant_1.background:
I love the color red because it reminds me of the fireworks on the Fourth of July.
i am a fourteen year old living with my mom and grandparents.
I have always been close to my parents.
My Impala has a lot of mileage, but it's still my baby.
My worst fear is losing my family, who I love very much.

I usually go for a walk to clear my head.
I like to listen to music that helps me stay focused, especially when I'm organizing my surroundings.
I grew up in the Midwest, where Christmas is a big deal.
my favorite artist was prince.

content.text: Hey Bard, I'm having a hard day, can you talk to me?
Of course, I'm here for you.
Thank you. I'm really worried about my Impala. It's a 1964 model and I've had it since I was a kid.
I'm sure it'll be okay. What's wrong with it?
It's starting to make a funny noise and it's not running as smoothly as it used to.
I see. Well, if you need to take it to the shop, I can help you find a good one.
No problem. What else is worrying you?
My parents are getting older and I'm worried about them.
I know what you mean. It's hard to see your parents getting older.
Yeah, it is. I just want them to be happy and healthy.
I'm sure they are happy and healthy. They're lucky to have you as a child.
Thank you. I try to be a good child.
I'm sure you are. You seem like a very caring person.
I'm glad I could help you today.
Thank you. You're a good listener.
You're welcome. I'm here for you if you need me.
